description: Creamy, nutritious zucchini smoothie with bananas, blueberries, greens, and hemp seeds! Loaded with 8 whole ingredients, plus 1 blender and 10 minutes required! Entirely vegan, gluten-free, and loaded with health benefits.
name: Creamy Zucchini Blueberry Smoothie
recipeIngredient: 1 large ripe banana (previously peeled, sliced, and frozen)
1 cup frozen wild blueberries (organic when possible)
1 handful greens (spinach is best // organic when possible)
1 Tbsp hemp seeds (or sub vegan protein powder)
1 cup light coconut milk (or store-bought // or sub water)
1/2 tsp maca powder (optional // for mood enhancement and hormone balance)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients to a high-speed blender and blend on high until creamy and smooth. Taste and adjust flavor as needed, adding more cinnamon for warmth/spice, banana for sweetness, or zucchini for creaminess.

Divide between 2 serving glasses (or more or less if altering batch size) and garnish with blueberries and hemp seeds (optional). Best when fresh. Store leftovers covered in the refrigerator up to 24 hours.
